function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to untreated air from an HIV-TB ward","Impact":"Increased risk of tuberculosis infection and disease","Mitigation":"Use of air purification systems and ventilation to reduce the presence of infectious particles in the air","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV lights, ionizers","People":"Animal subjects, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Presence of infectious particles in the air","Impact":"Increased risk of tuberculosis transmission","Mitigation":"Use of air disinfection technologies and improved ventilation systems to reduce the concentration of infectious particles","Technologies":"UV lights, ionizers, ventilation systems","People":"Animal subjects, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate air circulation in the ward","Impact":"Facilitates the spread of airborne infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Installation of mixing fans and proper ventilation systems to improve air circulation and reduce the accumulation of infectious particles","Technologies":"Mixing fans, ventilation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities"}]}
